comments:
Build ID: M20060921-0945

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create a taskdef using a JAR file (classpath) and set the value of the attribute "resource" to an antlib xml definition within the JAR

Example (in my case, I used the ant4eclipse-0.5.0.beta.jar from http://ant4eclipse.sourceforge.net):

<path id="path.taskdef.classpath">
	<fileset dir="${basedir}/build/lib">
		<include name="**/*.jar" />
	</fileset>
</path>

<taskdef resource="net/sf/ant4eclipse/antlib.xml">
	<classpath refid="path.taskdef.classpath" />
</taskdef>

More information:
Running ant from command or from inside Eclipse line works fine. The error occures when trying to open the build file in the AntEditor.
